summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Fat & Slim fitness coaching app MVP. Tested backend APIs (90.9% success rate), frontend UI flows, authentication, onboarding, and core features. Most functionality working correctly with minor AI service issues.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 520 error during AI food image analysis
flaky_endpoints.impact: Food scanner AI analysis not working

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 520 error during AI meal plan generation

ui_bugs.issue: Radio button selection timeout on goal selection step

integration_issues.issue: Workout generation takes too long or times out in UI

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and CTAs
Dashboard loads with calories summary and quick actions
Food scanner page with camera/upload options
Nutrition page with daily summary and manual food logging
Workouts page with generation and logging features
Progress page with weight tracking and charts
Profile page with theme toggle and user info
Theme toggle switches between light/dark modes
Google OAuth button present on login/register
All CRUD operations for food, workouts, weight tracking
Profile management and onboarding data persistence

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (most UI flows working, minor issues with onboarding and AI timeouts)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix AI service timeouts for food analysis and meal plan generation (520 errors). Investigate onboarding radio button selection issue. AI workout generation works but meal plans fail - check EMERGENT_LLM_KEY rate limits or service availability.
